channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Kennedy Center terminates dance programming team
item.description: This is the latest shakeup since Trump took over the cultural center. "We will have an exciting announcement about the new direction for Dance programming soon," said a Kennedy Center spokesperson.
item.content:encoded:
This is the latest shakeup since Trump took over the cultural center. "We will have an exciting announcement about the new direction for Dance programming soon," said a Kennedy Center spokesperson.

(Image credit: ANNA-ROSE GASSOT/AFP via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Andrew Limbong

item.title: Supreme Court allows NIH to stop making nearly $800M in research grants for now
item.description: But the court, in its emergency-docket order, left in place by a 5-4 order a lower court ruling that threw out National Institutes of Health memos that enforced the administration's policies.
item.content:encoded:
But the court, in its emergency-docket order, left in place by a 5-4 order a lower court ruling that threw out National Institutes of Health memos that enforced the administration's policies.

(Image credit: Andrew Harnik)
item.dc:creator: Nina Totenberg

item.title: Vance touts tax cuts, Trump's domestic agenda in Georgia
item.description: The vice president spoke about the administration's domestic agenda enacted in a sweeping bill last month that will shift resources from social safety programs to immigration enforcement and tax cuts.
item.content:encoded:
The vice president spoke about the administration's domestic agenda enacted in a sweeping bill last month that will shift resources from social safety programs to immigration enforcement and tax cuts.

(Image credit: Stephen Fowler)
item.dc:creator: Stephen Fowler

item.title: Hamas has one top strategy: End the war and survive
item.description: Hamas has endorsed a new proposal for a ceasefire deal with Israel in Gaza, as it faces pressure from Arab countries and seeks to ensure its own survival.
item.content:encoded:
Hamas has endorsed a new proposal for a ceasefire deal with Israel in Gaza, as it faces pressure from Arab countries and seeks to ensure its own survival.

(Image credit: Eyad Baba)
item.dc:creator: Daniel Estrin

item.title: Texas and California near new partisan voting maps in a battle prompted by Trump
item.description: California and Texas, the country's two most populous states, are getting closer to redrawing their congressional districts in a political fight sparked by President Trump.
item.content:encoded:
California and Texas, the country's two most populous states, are getting closer to redrawing their congressional districts in a political fight sparked by President Trump.

(Image credit: Tayfun Coskun/Anadolu via Getty Images; Brandon Bell)
item.dc:creator: Andrew Schneider

item.title: Trump delivers pizza to National Guard working on his DC crackdown
item.description: President Trump thanked National Guard soldiers and police officers involved in his crackdown on what he has described as rampant crime in Washington, D.C.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump thanked National Guard soldiers and police officers involved in his crackdown on what he has described as rampant crime in Washington, D.C.

(Image credit: Jacquelyn Martin)
item.dc:creator: Franco Ordo√±ez

item.title: Artificial light has essentially lengthened birds' day
item.description: Millions of audio recordings of hundreds of bird species have revealed that artificial light is making the birds wake up earlier and go to bed later.
item.content:encoded:
Millions of audio recordings of hundreds of bird species have revealed that artificial light is making the birds wake up earlier and go to bed later.

(Image credit: Rasit Aydogan)
item.dc:creator: Nell Greenfieldboyce

item.title: With Fed under pressure, Jerome Powell prepares for a high-stakes speech
item.description: The Fed chair will speak Friday at an annual economic symposium in Jackson Hole, Wyo. The speech comes as the central bank is under mounting pressure from the White House to lower interest rates.
item.content:encoded:
The Fed chair will speak Friday at an annual economic symposium in Jackson Hole, Wyo. The speech comes as the central bank is under mounting pressure from the White House to lower interest rates.

(Image credit: Kent Nishimura)
item.dc:creator: Scott Horsley

item.title: An appeals court throws out a massive civil fraud penalty against President Trump
item.description: Trump, in a social media post, claimed "total victory" after the ruling, which spares him from a potential half-billion-dollar fine for decades of exaggerating his wealth.
item.content:encoded:
Trump, in a social media post, claimed "total victory" after the ruling, which spares him from a potential half-billion-dollar fine for decades of exaggerating his wealth.

(Image credit: Seth Wenig)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Hurricane Erin brings flooding to parts of Outer Banks as it pivots from East Coast
item.description: The storm flooded parts of North Carolina's Outer Banks, including a section of the main highway. Another round of overwash was happening during the evening's high tide.
item.content:encoded:
The storm flooded parts of North Carolina's Outer Banks, including a section of the main highway. Another round of overwash was happening during the evening's high tide.

(Image credit: Allen G. Breed)
item.dc:creator: Scott Neuman
